§ 60503. Reauthorization of Glory Mission Congress reauthorizes the Administration to continue with development of the Glory Mission, which will examine how aerosols and solar energy affect the Earth’s climate. (Pub. L. 111–314, § 3, Dec. 18, 2010, 124 Stat. 3425.)
